programs.name: Clean Water Initiative
programs.description: Providing clean and safe drinking water to communities in need.

programs.name: Education for All
programs.description: Supporting educational programs to ensure every child has access to quality education.

programs.name: Food Security Project
programs.description: Addressing hunger and malnutrition by providing nutritious food to families.

programs.name: Healthcare Outreach
programs.description: Delivering medical services and supplies to underserved communities.

programs.name: End Femicide
programs.description: Raise awareness and support initiatives to end femicide and violence against women.

programs.name: Natural Disasters
programs.description: Support disaster relief efforts and help communities affected by natural disasters.

programs.name: Make Her Smile
programs.description: Support Girlchild by donating pads and promoting menstrual hygiene.

programs.name: Childrens Home Basic Support
programs.description: Support orphaned and vulnerable children by contributing to their well-being and education.

programs.name: FGM Fight
programs.description: Join the fight against Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) and advocate for its elimination.

programs.name: Organ Donation
programs.description: Raise awareness about organ donation and encourage individuals to become organ donors.
